p: ML hits which replicate also include the missense variant rs2306331 (AP4E1). This is within the known locus of SPPL2A (maximum r2 0.32, minimum distance 177 kb with rs2306331 and GWAS catalogue hits for SPPL2A), but may be an independent signal with the region. The AP4E1 gene encodes the ε subunit of adaptor protein complex-4 (AP-4), which facilitates the transport of amyloid precursor protein (APP) from the trans-Golgi network to endosomes. Disruption of the APP-AP-4 interaction enhances γ-secretase-catalysed cleavage of APP to amyloid-β peptide, suggesting that AP-4 deficiency may constitute a potential risk factor for Alzheimer’s disease34.
